question:
Which of the following is correct regarding internal trade during the early medieval period?
1. There was a decline in the internal trade of the country.
2. The petty feudal chiefs molested and plundered the merchants on the highways. 
3. There were too many feudal dues to be paid in the course of internal trade.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: There was a decline in the internal trade of the country during the early medieval period. The petty feudal chiefs often molested and plundered the merchants on the highways.  Also there were too many feudal dues that were supposed to be paid in the course of internal trade.
